#text=My car was in the shop , so today I decided to commute to school on a public bus .
#text=First , I looked up what bus I would need .
#text=I found I need to take two buses and transfer in the middle .
#text=I started walking to the first bus stop and arrived ten minutes before the bus was scheduled to arrive .
#text=It came on time , and the bus driver let off the other passengers .
#text=I stepped onto the bus and paid the driver the fare .
#text=Then I found an open seat by a window and sat down .
#text=The ride was around 15 minutes or so .
#text=Outside , I found a bench and sat down .
#text=I hopped on and showed the driver my transfer ticket .
#text=This time , the bus was packed , so I found a pole and hung on .
#text=The ride was n't too long , however , and soon I was at my final destination .
#text=I found my way off the bus and walked over to school .
